articles.title: ‘Paulo Londra: Bzrp Music Sessions, Vol. 23’ Tops Argentina Hot 100
articles.description: “Paulo Londra: BZRP Music Sessions, Vol. 23” by Paulo Londra and Bizarrap tops the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart for a second week.
articles.content: “Paulo Londra: BZRP Music Sessions, Vol. 23” by Paulo Londra and Bizarrap tops the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart for a second week. It’s the second music session by Bizarrap to lead for at least two weeks or more, trailing only “BZRP Music Sessio... [897 chars]

articles.title: MCG ‘Superclasico’ cancelled following Argentina’s withdrawal
articles.description: MCG blockbuster canned as Argentina ’not prepared to travel to Australia’
articles.content:
The “Superclasico” between South American giants Brazil and Argentina that was scheduled to be played at the MCG on June 11 has been called off.

articles.title: Brazil friendly game vs. Argentina canceled; Jesus recalled
articles.description: SAO PAULO (AP) — Brazil’s friendly match against rival Argentina scheduled for June in Australia has been canceled.

articles.title: Argentina accelerates hike in minimum wage
articles.description:
Argentina will increase its monthly minimum wage to 45,540 pesos ($389.46) in June and to 47,850 pesos in August, the Ministry of Economy said on Tuesday.
Argentina's Consumer Price Index (CPI) is expected to have grown 5.9% in April, largely due to the rise in prices in the 'Food and Beverages' and 'Clothing' categories, according to a Reuters poll.
articles.content: Argentina will increase its monthly minimum wage to 45,540 pesos ($389.46) in June and to 47,850 pesos in August, the Ministry of Economy said on Tuesday. "The increases in (minimum wage) that were scheduled for August and December respectively have ... [591 chars]
